title: Will Smith: Fresh Prince to Fallen King | Enemy of the State | 4
description:
After years of soul searching and reflection, Will Smith is finally ready to confront his demons — and Hollywood rewards him for it. With his third Best Actor nomination under his belt, the Fresh Prince is inches away from his crowning achievement. But the scared kid he used to be is still hiding under all that swagger and bravado. And when Will lets his fear take over at a crucial moment, he nearly loses it all.
